metadata.title: CVE-2017-10965 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Irssi before 1.0.4. When receiving messages withinvalid time stamps, Irssi would try to dereference a NULL pointer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10965` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3.3').
